predicate.note: Frames file for 'precipitate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The British press , [*-2] making a mountain out of a molehill , precipitated an unnecessary economic crisis by [*-2] portraying Mrs. Thatcher as an autocrat who [*T*-1] had thrown economic policy into confusion by [*-3] driving a respected figure from her government .
example.arg: [*-2] making a mountain out of a molehill
by [*-2] portraying Mrs. Thatcher as an autocrat who [*T*-1] had thrown economic policy into confusion by [*-3] driving a respected figure from her government
